title: Nutritional and bioactive properties and antioxidant potential of Amaranthus tricolor, A. lividus, A viridis, and A. spinosus leafy vegetables
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Umakanta Sarker, Shinya Oba, Riaz Ullah, Ahmed Bari, Sezai Ercisli, Sona Skrovankova, Anna Adamkova, Magdalena Zvonkova, Jiri Mlcek
